name: Balls War
description:
Project in collaboration with Vincent Chang.

A top-down shooter game inspired by Unity tutorial "Roll a Ball" where the player controls a moving ball to eliminate enemies in a vast desert.

Control :

Our ball can be controlled by hand gestures by using Teachable Machine, an easy learning machine from Google. Keyboard controls are also available:

  • Up, Down, Left, Right - Movement 
  • 1 - Attack
  • 2 - Shield
  • 3 - Reload
Ressource :
  • SFX, Music :  Tank! Tutorial
  • Environnement : Tank! Tutorial
  • Vfx : Free particule System pack
  • Loot asset : Wen-Power up!
  • Machinegun : Submachinegun  Reaper
